name: skill-link
short_effect: Extends two-to-five-hit moves and triple kick to their full length every time.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Maximizes the number of times multi-strike moves hit.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Maximizes the number of times multi-strike moves hit.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Maximizes the number of times multistrike moves hit.
